TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 通知用戶端已變更屬性值。

span.span: Notifies clients that a property value has changed.
Occurs when a property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可表示物件上的所有屬性已都變更使用其中一種`null`或是中的屬性名稱為。The event can indicate all properties on the object have changed by using either `null` or as the property name in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作事件的介面。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the event of the interface.
